name: astro-micro-frontends
description: A micro frontend built with astro

scripts.dev: concurrently -n team_buy, team_find "npm run dev --workspace=packages/team_buy" "npm run dev --workspace=packages/team_find"
scripts.build: concurrently -n team_buy, team_find "npm run build --workspace=packages/team_buy" "npm run build --workspace=packages/team_find"
scripts.preview: concurrently -n ngninx,team_buy, team_find "npm run start --workspace=packages/nginx" "npm run preview --workspace=packages/team_buy" "npm run preview --workspace=packages/team_find"

author: Johannes Klauss
